Afogatran 150 Capsule should be used with caution in patients with severe kidney disease. Dose adjustment of Afogatran 150 Capsule may be needed. Please consult your doctor.
Use of Afogatran 150 Capsule is not recommended in patients with severe kidney disease.

Ditocet 5mg Tablet should be used with caution in patients with kidney disease. Dose adjustment of Ditocet 5mg Tablet may be needed. Please consult your doctor.
Use of Ditocet 5mg Tablet is not recommended in patients with severe kidney disease.
Dare 500mg Tablet should be used with caution in patients with severe kidney disease. Dose adjustment of Dare 500mg Tablet may be needed. Please consult your doctor.

There is limited information available on the use of Dyazide 250mg Injection in patients with kidney disease. Please consult your doctor.
This medicine contains progesterone which can cause fluid retention in patients with underlying kidney disease.
Dexcol AX Syrup should be used with caution in patients with kidney disease. Dose adjustment of Dexcol AX Syrup may be needed. Please consult your doctor.
